trans-unit.source: Duelist's Heritage
trans-unit.target: 斗客的遗产

trans-unit.resname: C16·1 | Duelist's Heritage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures attack, you may have target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个生物攻击时，你可以让目标进行攻击的生物获得连击异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The best techniques outlive their creators.
trans-unit.target: 最佳招式能流芳千古。

trans-unit.source: Entrapment Maneuver
trans-unit.target: 诱捕计略

trans-unit.resname: C16·2 | Entrapment Maneuver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. You create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is that creature's toughness.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手牺牲一个进行攻击的生物。你派出X个1/1白色士兵衍生生物，X为该生物的防御力。

trans-unit.source: "Greed, rage, and bloodlust all lead to death at the hands of those who keep their heads."\n—Sergeant Eyra
trans-unit.target: 「贪婪、狂怒、嗜血，这些终究都会败在冷静手中。」 ～士官埃拉

trans-unit.source: Orzhov Advokist
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫倡议人

trans-unit.resname: C16·3 | Orzhov Advokist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature he or she controls. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or a planeswalker you control until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，每位牌手各可以在一个由其操控的生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。若有牌手如此作，则直到你的下一个回合，由该牌手操控的生物不能攻击你或由你操控的鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: The Orzhov care not for repentance, only repayment.
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫并不在乎你是否悔过，只在乎你是否赔过。

trans-unit.source: Selfless Squire
trans-unit.target: 无私扈从

trans-unit.resname: C16·4 | Selfless Squire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn.\nWhenever damage that would be dealt to you is prevented, put that many +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，防止本回合中将对你造成的所有伤害。 每当任一效应防止将对你造成的伤害时，在CARDNAME上放置等量的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Sublime Exhalation
trans-unit.target: 升灵吐息

trans-unit.resname: C16·5 | Sublime Exhalation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)\nDestroy all creatures.
trans-unit.target: 不屈（每有一位对手，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。） 消灭所有生物。

trans-unit.source: Exhale, and let the winds carry your soul for all eternity.
trans-unit.target: 深呼吸，令清风承灵魂往永生。

trans-unit.source: Coastal Breach
trans-unit.target: 裂岸怒涛

trans-unit.source: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)\nReturn all nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 不屈（每有一位对手，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。） 将所有非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: The sea filled the villagers' nets until the day it cast its own.
trans-unit.target: 村民渔网遍布海疆，怎想终有大海撒网的一天。

trans-unit.source: Deepglow Skate
trans-unit.target: 渊光鳐

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, double the number of each kind of counter on any number of target permanents.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择任意数量的目标永久物。将这些永久物上面的各种指示物数量加倍。

trans-unit.source: Its graceful glide paints the ocean floor with strokes of luminescence.
trans-unit.target: 优雅曳动，缀海床以流光。

trans-unit.source: Faerie Artisans
trans-unit.target: 仙灵工匠

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, create a token that's a copy of that creature except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. Then exile all other tokens created with CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当一个非衍生物的生物在对手的操控下进战场时，派出一个衍生物，该衍生物为该生物的复制品，但额外具有神器此类别。然后放逐所有以CARDNAME派出的其他衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: C16·9 | Grip of Phyresis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Even your blade knows who will triumph here."\n—Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
trans-unit.target: 「就连你的剑都知道谁会获胜。」 ～魔判官之声亚崔夏

trans-unit.source: Manifold Insights
trans-unit.target: 多相眼光

trans-unit.resname: C16·10 | Manifold Insights | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top ten cards of your library. Starting with the next opponent in turn order, each opponent chooses a different nonland card from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的十张牌。所有对手依照回合的顺序，从接下来的对手开始，各选择其中一张非地牌，且不能重复选择。将被选中的牌置于你手上，并将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Choose target player and another target player. The first player controls the second player during the second player's next turn, and the second player controls the first player during the first player's next turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标牌手和另一位目标牌手。后者牌手在其下个回合由前者牌手操控，且前者牌手在其下个回合由后者牌手操控。

trans-unit.target: 结附于牌手 每当所结附的牌手施放咒语时，在CARDNAME上放置一个怨恨指示物。 当所结附的牌手输掉这盘游戏时，你获得X点生命且抓X张牌，X为CARDNAME上怨恨指示物的数量。

trans-unit.source: "These eyes have shown me the flaws of flesh."

trans-unit.source: "To spend your life seeking, only to find regret upon achieving . . . this is the most delicious irony of all."\n—Leshrac, Walker of Night
trans-unit.target: 「你穷尽一生去追寻，到头来却只寻到悔恨. . . 这真是最绝妙的讽刺。」 ～夜访者拉席克

For each of those creatures, its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card, puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles the rest into his or her library.

trans-unit.target: 掘穴（你于施放此咒语时每从你坟墓场中放逐一张牌，就能为此咒语支付{1}。） 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.
trans-unit.target: 金玉漂流在外，阴谋勾画其间。

trans-unit.source: Trinket Mage
trans-unit.target: 琐物法师

trans-unit.resname: C16·102 | Trinket Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于1的神器牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Vedalken Engineer
trans-unit.target: 维多肯工程师

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加两点任意颜色的单色法术力到你的法术力池中。此法术力只能用来施放神器咒语，或是起动神器的异能。

trans-unit.source: Art is unknown to the vedalken—for them, all creations must serve a purpose.
trans-unit.target: 维多肯族不懂艺术～对他们来说，万物均各有创造目的。

trans-unit.source: "The light of my master's guidance traverses all boundaries, even those separating life and death."

trans-unit.source: A single festercreep isn't alone. It's already an infestation.

trans-unit.source: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.
trans-unit.target: 圣物塔从前由圣物骑士守护，但如今保护它的只剩它与人世的疏离，任谁都可轻易掠尽它那积满尘土的珍宝。

trans-unit.source: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.
trans-unit.target: 勇得这世界与其间居民一样残酷。各种野蛮搏斗在大地划下伤痕，大地则型塑这些蛮兽，构成无法控制的残暴循环。

trans-unit.target: 海滨殿堂

trans-unit.source: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.
trans-unit.target: 为了智慧，它建在高地来监看万物。为了荣誉，它建在高地以验证勇武。为了力量，它建在高地好斥退攻势。

When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)\n{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.\n{R}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if an opponent was dealt 7 or more damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: 掩蔽（此地须横置进战场。当它进战场时，检视你牌库顶的四张牌，将其中一张牌面朝下地放逐，然后将其余的牌置于你牌库底。） {T}：加{R}到你的法术力池中。 {R}，{T}：如果某对手在本回合中受过7点或更多伤害，则你可以使用所放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.
